DOC.brief_summary: This is a trial in obese subjects to study the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multiple doses of PF-05231023.
DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study Of PF-05231023 In Obese Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male and female subjects of nonchildbearing potential between the ages of 21 and 70. Subjects with a BMI of 30 to 45.4 kg/m2 and total body weight >110 lbs. Recent (6 months) unstable concurrent disease. History of allergic disease or drug allergies. Any condition affecting food consumption or absorption.
